item.title: Simple Mediterranean Pasta Salad
item.dc:creator: Katie Austin
item.description:
This Simple Mediterranean Pasta Salad is fresh, flavorful, and SO satisfying. It’s perfect for meal prep, picnics, or a light lunch, especially during these summer months!

SERVING SIZE: 4-6 SERVINGS

Ingredients:

1.5 cups dry Ditalini pasta

1.5 cups cucumber, diced
